Text: Thank you for making it small in size yet good in quality!

A9,V9,V9 I'm hooked on your downloads. StylishHal used to do Mkvs but now mostly Mp4s.  Mkvs take have as long to burn using DirectX-a big savings in time. Hope you upload "Sleepwalk With Me"--been looking 4 it with no success. Thanks!
But MP4 is a superior format.  MKV sucks balls. No ones cares if it takes you a few extra minutes to burn a movie. VYTO: Please create MP4 instead of mkv. Thanx.
